stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Aerospace Sector Phishing Emails with Dropbox Theme Create CTFMON Malware
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description:
On 7 November 2014 a U.S. government department reported observing a series of forwarded emails with a subject line "You've connected an iPad to Dropbox", and an invalid X-Mailer "Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.5589". The emails were sent using automatic forwarding through a chain of three email addresses, two on the domains of aerospace and defense sector companies and the third belonging to a U.S. government department. All three victim/compromised addresses were associated with the same first and last name and are likely the same person.
The emails contained an HTML link that directs to http://gallosport.com/list/default.html?<UNIQUE ID>

Awesome!, You can check on this and any other devices you've connected by visiting your account page. P.S. If you didn't make this change, let us know. Happy Dropboxing! The Dropbox Team ----- END EMAIL BODY -----
The email contained a link that directs to: http://gallosport.com/list/default.html?<UNIQUE ID>
